comments:
While trying to reload my models specified with annonated Java (that worked in EMF 2.2.0), I received this error and was not able to reload.  I've attached the project with the offending models.

Created an attachment (id=63539)
project org.eclipse.ohf.stem.core

contains five (5) models specified with annontated java

I'll return this as duplicate of https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=182007 since the change committed for that bug was in the same file and hence the only fix I made for this bug was committed as part of that one.  I was actually getting null pointer exceptions, which is what I fixed.  There were already previous committed fixes which avoids throwing an exceptions if the compilation unit only has warnings as opposed to errors.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 182007 ***
